_header: Mine heart is set and all mine whole intent
Title(s): ‘How þe louer is sett to serve þe floure’
_description: ‘How þe louer is sett to serve þe floure’, including a reproof to Lydgate — twelve stanzas rhyme royal

BodFair16.First Lines:
Myn hert ys set and all myn hole ententTo serue this flour in my
                    most humble wyse…
BodFair16.Last Lines:
…ffor alle that euer thou hast sayde byforeHaue mynde of this
                    for now I wryte no more
